level.heading: Transfer of ownership of establishments which permit nude dancing.
level.text: A licensee under 25-371(b) may transfer ownership in accordance with the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: HISTORICAL AND STATUTORY NOTES
level.text: D.C. Law 13-298 amended and enacted into law Title 25 of the District of Columbia Official Code.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following ยง 25-101.
